content.raw:
the prerelease has been made (thanks @{557058:155a32e2-420c-4d50-98e0-0e722f63f906}!), and I've started new jenkins jobs using the release-tools PR:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/939/gazebo11-use-sdf9/diff

I also queued a homebrew build using the related homebrew PR:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1865)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1865/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1865/
* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/945
